title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and attempting to access a URL, the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK response without any content.
EB: The expected behavior is for the server to respond with an HTTP error code 404, indicating that the requested resource was not found.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Download the Tomcat 7 binary package from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps
3. Access any URL hosted by the Tomcat server
